Interface dominoes.DominoUI

public interface DominoUI
extends Object
This interface represents a user interface for the dominoes game. It has methods for updating the display at appropriate times.

display(DominoPlayer[], Table, BoneYard)
This method displays the current state of the players, the table, and the boneyard as appropriate for the UI.
displayInvalidPlay(DominoPlayer)
This method displays that the specified player made an illegal play
displayRoundWinner(DominoPlayer)
This method displays the winner for the round

display 
  public abstract void display(DominoPlayer players[],
                               Table table,
                               BoneYard boneyard)
This method displays the current state of the players, the table, and the boneyard as appropriate for the UI.
Parameters:
players - The players involved in the domino game
table - The domino table to display
boneyard - The boneyard to display
displayRoundWinner 
  public abstract void displayRoundWinner(DominoPlayer player)
This method displays the winner for the round
Parameters:
player - the winning player for the round. null if there was a draw.
displayInvalidPlay 
  public abstract void displayInvalidPlay(DominoPlayer player)
This method displays that the specified player made an illegal play
Parameters:
player - The player making the illegal play
